thread.title: Nasdaq lists its first 'pure play' pot stock

title: Nasdaq lists its first 'pure play' pot stock
text:
Nasdaq lists its first 'pure play' pot stock 3:08pm EST - 01:25 
Candian medical marijuana producer Cronos Group lists on Nasdaq, becoming the first publicly traded company in the US that grows and processes cannabis. Elly Park reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Candian medical marijuana producer Cronos Group lists on Nasdaq, becoming the first publicly traded company in the US that grows and processes cannabis. Elly Park reports.
